the ExtendedTextEditor changed API method names of

isOverviewRulerVisible
isLineNumberRulerVisible

additionally, it relied on initalizeEditor being called by subclasses overriding it.

I will provide a fix for these shortcomings.

Created an attachment (id=5799)
fix

fixes API breakage in ExtendedTextEditor, reverts respective changes in
TextEditor and JavaEditor.
